description: Associates key-value tag pairs to your Amazon Managed Workflows for Apache Airflow (MWAA) environment.

parameters.name: ResourceArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Amazon MWAA environment. For example, arn:aws:airflow:us-east-1:123456789012:environment/MyMWAAEnvironment.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: The key-value tag pairs you want to associate to your environment. For example, "Environment": "Staging". For more information, see Tagging Amazon Web Services resources. (string) --- (string) ---
